name: .BRG File Extension
summary: Learn about .BRG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Three-dimensional graphics file used by Age of Mythology, a real-time strategy game; contains model data used for game objects such as structures and units; is sometimes altered by players to create custom game graphics.

content: BRG files can be opened by AOM Edit, which is also called AOMed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
